mapper.insert:
insert into UM_COMMON (ID, "NAME", "OPTIONS", PID, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, SYMBOL) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.options,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into UM_COMMON (ID, "NAME", "OPTIONS", PID, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, SYMBOL) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{options,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) on duplicate key update ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, "NAME" = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "OPTIONS" = #{options,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYMBOL = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into UM_COMMON
ID,
"NAME",
"OPTIONS",
PID,
DESCRIPTION,
PRIORITY,
SYMBOL,
values
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{options,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on duplicate key update
ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
"NAME" = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"OPTIONS" = #{options,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYMBOL = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
